name: TestimonialCardOne
description: Testimonial card with image background, star rating, name, role, and company overlay.

description.example: Real feedback from our valued customers

imageAlt.note: Alt text for image (defaults to customer name if not provided)

propsSchema.testimonials: Array<{ id: string, name: string, role: string, company: string, rating: number, imageSrc: string, imageAlt?: string }>
propsSchema.animationType: 'none' | 'opacity' | 'slide-up' | 'scale-rotate' | 'blur-reveal' (required - controls GSAP scroll animations with stagger effect)
propsSchema.title: string
propsSchema.titleSegments?: Array<{ type: 'text', content: string } | { type: 'image', src: string, alt?: string }> - For inline images in title
propsSchema.buttons?: Array<{text: string, onClick?: () => void, href?: string}>
propsSchema.textboxLayout: 'default' | 'split' | 'split-actions' | 'split-description' | 'inline-image' (required - 'inline-image' uses titleSegments for rich text with images)

usageExample: <TestimonialCardOne testimonials={[{ id: '1', name: 'Alisa Hester', role: 'PM, Hourglass', company: 'Web Design Agency', rating: 5, imageSrc: '/testimonials/alisa.jpg' }]} title="What Our Customers Say" description="Real feedback from our customers" gridVariant="uniform-all-items-equal" textboxLayout="default" animationType="slide-up" useInvertedBackground={"noInvert"} />
